value.title: This Site Published Every Face From Parler's Capitol Riot Videos
value.excerpt: Faces of the Riot used open source software to detect, extract, and deduplicate every face from the 827 videos taken from the insurrection on January 6.

value.title: GM and Cruise lend a hand to Honda's self-driving mobility service
value.excerpt: Honda is in for a little help from General Motors and Cruise Automation. On Wednesday, the Japanese automaker said GM and Cruise Automation will help its upcoming self-driving mobility service in Japan.

value.title: Deep learning-based detection of dental prostheses and restorations

value.title: Google to shut down Loon
value.excerpt: Google announced Jan. 21 it is shutting down Loon, a venture to provide wireless connectivity by balloon that some considered a competitor to satellites.

value.title: Google targets AI ethics lead Margaret Mitchell after firing Timnit Gebru
value.excerpt: Margaret Mitchell leads the Google AI ethics team following the firing of Timnit Gebru. Now Google said Mitchell is under investigation.

value.title: CES 2021 Celebrates New Era With Whimsical Robots, AI Influencers And Billie Eilish

value.title: Artificial Intelligence may outsmart our brain in chess, but not in memory
value.excerpt: Artificial Intelligence has shown to be very good at achieving exceptional goals in several fields. Oslo (Norway): A new research has shown that the brain strategy for storing memories is more efficient than that of Artificial intelligence (AI).

value.title: Technologists Use Facial Recognition on Parler Videos
value.excerpt: Technologists have used facial recognition techniques on the large archive of Parler videos filmed from the January 6 Capitol riots, Motherboard has learned. In some cases they have been able to track individual faces across different videos,

value.title: Facebook updates its automatic alternative text system with expanded object recognition
value.excerpt: The next-generation AAT system can identify more objects in photos, perceive where each object is located relative to each other and provide more detailed descriptions.

value.title: Understanding machine learning will go a long way toward higher adoption for SMBs
value.excerpt: Expert says larger companies are more willing to spend money for top talent to achieve machine learning, whereas smaller companies aren't able to do so. Pre-configured solutions can help.

value.title: 14 Tech Experts Predict Which Industries And Sectors Will Benefit Most From AI
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence and machine learning have made their way into many diverse industries, changing the way businesses handle everything from inventory to customer relations.

value.title: Redacting PII from application log output with Amazon Comprehend
value.excerpt: Amazon Comprehend is a natural language processing (NLP) service that uses machine learning (ML) to find insights and relationships in text. value.title: New AI system counts endangered elephants from space
value.excerpt: Scientists have combined satellite cameras with a convolutional neural network (CNN) to detect African elephants moving through forests and grasslands.

value.title: Innovate Finance: The UK Retains European Fintech Investment Crown in 2020

value.title: Facebook AI Gets Better at Describing Photos for Visually Impaired Users
value.excerpt: In an effort to better accommodate users who are blind or visually impaired, Facebook this week updated its automatic alternative text (AAT) technology. value.title: Microsoft researchers tap AI for anonymous data sharing for health care providers
value.excerpt: Microsoft and University of British Columbia researchers propose FELICA, a system that leverages AI to let health providers share data.

value.title: Nucleus Research Releases Q1 2021 Equity Snapshot for IBM
value.excerpt: Nucleus Research, a global provider of ROI-focused technology research and advisory services, today released its Q1 2021 Equity Snapshot for IBM. The snapshot provides an analysis of IBM’s market growth and performance over the last quarter and a competitive outlook for the months ahead.
